          <title>
            <string language="en">Nuclear reactions inside a thermal reactor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kernreaktionen innerhalb eines thermischen

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réactions nucléaires à l'intérieur d'un

αντιδραστήρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacciones nucleares dentro de un reactor termal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the different nuclear reactions occurring inside a thermal reactor.</string>
